sqlMap.select: select p.id, p.name, p.name_en, p.price, p.num, p.pics, p.isNew, p.description, c.id as cid, c.name as cname, c.name_en as cname_en, p.quarter from product as p left join category_product as cp on p.id = cp.product_id left join category as c on cp.category_id = c.id where cp.category_id = #cateId# and p.quarter = #quarter#

select p.id, p.name, p.name_en, p.price, p.num, p.pics, p.isNew, p.description, c.id as cid, c.name as cname, c.name_en as cname_en, p.quarter from product as p left join category_product as cp on p.id = cp.product_id left join category as c on cp.category_id = c.id where p.quarter = #quarter# limit #start#,#length#

select p.id, p.name, p.name_en, p.price, p.num, p.pics, p.isNew, p.description, c.id as cid, c.name as cname, c.name_en as cname_en, p.quarter from product as p left join category_product as cp on p.id = cp.product_id left join category as c on cp.category_id = c.id where p.id = #id#
